value:
$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hello! I'm Peony, the Sweet Dream.
I come from Ljósálfheimr, the land
of the light elves!$k$p

Gain Peony as an ally by clearing
Book IV, Chapter 1: Part 5 on
Normal difficulty.

Defeat a foe that is level 15 or higher with an
infantry ally.

Defeat a foe that is level 15 or higher with a
cavalry ally.

Defeat a foe that is level 15 or higher with an
armored ally.

Defeat a foe that is level 15 or higher with a
flying ally.

Clear Paralogue 24: Part 1 with three allies
deployed. (Allies deployed as cohorts using
Pair Up do not count.) All three allies must
survive.

Clear Paralogue 24: Part 2 with three allies
deployed. (Allies deployed as cohorts using
Pair Up do not count.) All three allies must
survive.

Clear Paralogue 24: Part 3 with three allies
deployed. (Allies deployed as cohorts using
Pair Up do not count.) All three allies must
survive.
Defeat a sword foe that is level 30 or higher.
Defeat a lance foe that is level 30 or higher.
Defeat an axe foe that is level 30 or higher.

Defeat a colorless bow foe that is level 30
or higher.
Defeat a staff foe that is level 30 or higher.

Defeat a colorless dagger foe that is level 30
or higher.

Clear Paralogue 11: Part 1 on Hard or higher
difficulty with three allies deployed. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All three allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 11: Part 2 on Hard or higher
difficulty with three allies deployed. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All three allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 11: Part 3 on Hard or higher
difficulty with three allies deployed. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All three allies must survive.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Takumi &
Hinoka on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Tana &
Amelia on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Raven &
Lucius on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Corrin &
Azura on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Chrom &
Lissa on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Tiki &
Nowi on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Seliph &
Julia on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Hector &
Matthew on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Leo &
Elise on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Micaiah &
Sothe on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
a team with an infantry, armored, cavalry,
and flying ally.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Allegiance Battles at any difficulty.

Clear Paralogue 43: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 43: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 43: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

The stern, commanding Emperor of Rigel.
Father of Alm and uncle of Berkut. Appears
in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A young girl madly in love with Alm. Eager to
express her growing feelings to her beloved at
the Day of Devotion festival. Appears in Fire
Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A cleric from Novis. Appreciative of everyone's
hard work day in and day out. Appears in Fire
Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Prince of Rigel and princess of Zofia. Ended
the strife between their countries and founded
the One Kingdom of Valentia. They appear in
Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Celica's older brother. Lovingly dotes on his
younger sister. Decided to put his mask away
for the Day of Devotion festivities. Appears in
Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

(Duo Skills can be used once per map by
tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot
be used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 185, treats unit's stats as 185 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

The love Alm and Celica share takes
shape in their Duo Skill, which boosts
stats AND restores HP in a wide area!

Alm's father, Rudolf, whose firm spirit
and powerful attacks are enough to
strike fear in the heart of any enemy.

If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target or
targeting ally and allies within 2 spaces of unit
and target or targeting ally for 1 turn after
movement. (Excludes unit.)

Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat,
but if unit attacked, deals 4 damage to unit
after combat.

$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

If unit is within 3 spaces of 2 or more allies who
each have total bonuses ≥ 10, grants Atk/Def+3
during combat and unit attacks twice.

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally who has
HP < 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit
during combat.

Grants Atk/Spd+3 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd+3 to unit during combat.

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk,
inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat and foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if a bonus
granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active
on unit or if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants bonus to
unit's Atk = 25% of foe's Def and inflicts
penalty on foe's Atk = 25% of foe's Res
during combat.

Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat and
foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat and
foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+3 to ally with
the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+5 to ally with
the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

$aRestores 30 HP, neutralizes【Penalty】, and
grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit and allies within 5
rows and 5 columns centered on unit for 1 turn.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces
through their next actions.

At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+2 to unit for 1 turn.

At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.
